Detailed Description

This class provides API to generate digest for text string and file.

Two kinds of algorithms are supported, md5 and sha1. 

 step1. Construct a MessageDigest object, passing digest algorithm type
  (AlgoType_SHA1 or AlgoType_MD5) for the constructor.
 step2. Invoke function "digestGenerate" to generate digest, in this function,    
  you should specify the digest type(MD_Text or MD_File). that is, you want to generate digest 
  for a text string or a file.
 
 Sample:
 gaia::security::MessageDigest mdObject(gaia::security::AlgoType_SHA1);
 unsigned char* pOutDigestForString = NULL;
 unsigned char* pOutDigestForFile = NULL;
 pOutDigestForString = mdObject.digestGenerate((unsigned char*)"abc", gaia::security::MD_Text);
 pOutDigestForFile = mdObject.digestGenerate((unsigned char*)"abc", gaia::security::MD_File);
